wikipedia_page.main: Alan Charlton  (born 21 June 1952) is a British former diplomat who was ambassador to Brazil 2008–2013. He is now active in Education, lectures and writes.

response: The Grey Pictures were done at a time when there were monochrome paintings everywhere. I painted them nonetheless. ... Not Kelly, but Bob Ryman, Brice Marden, Alan Charlton, Yves Klein and many others.

link_mentions.page: List of ambassadors of the United Kingdom to Brazil

response: The emphasis lay on Conceptual Art, Land Art and Minimal Art. Artists that were represented in the collection included Alan Charlton, Francesco Clemente, Adam Colton, Tony Cragg, Ad Dekkers, Ger van Elk, Barry Flanagan, Gilbert & George, Richard Long, Keith Milow, Juan Muñoz, Nicholas Pope, Peter Struycken, David Tremlett, Richard Venlet, Carel Visser and Leo Vroegindeweij.
* Alan Charlton, Counsellor, Foreign and Commonwealth Office.

response: *Alan Charlton – diplomat and former British ambassador to Brazil (2008–2013)
